casebody.data:
William Barry FREEDMAN and Freedman Farms, Inc.
v.
Wayne James PAYNE and Michael R. Ramos No. 183P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Randolph M. James, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Freedman, William Barry. Melody Jewell Jolly, Attorney at Law, Patrick M. Mincey, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Payne, Wayne James. Joseph L. Nelson, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Ramos, Michael R.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of June 2017 by Plaintiff (William Barry Freedman) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
